headline: Danger Zone: How Will the Nets React to Biden Cratering to the 30s in Polling?
author: Scott Whitlock
sentences: The Real Clear Politics (RCP) average plummeted to 39.8 (with his disapproval up to 54.4).By way of comparison, George W. Bush didn’t drop into the 30s until well into his second term, March 2, 2006.
For these new polls, Ecomoist/YouGov, Rasmussen, Politico/Morning Consult and IBD/TIPP, the network morning and evening newscasts in the last week simply ignored them
On Wednesday, February 9, 2022, the Democrat’s approval rating dropped into the 30s.
Joe Biden has reached another record in his unpopularity.
How will journalists react to this terrible news?
Four new polls found him at 41, 40,41 or 38.
